welcome: Fresh Vegetables Delivered to Your Restaurant
description: Supplying restaurants with quality goods, daily. At Soukai, we specialize in providing top-quality, farm-fresh vegetables tailored to the specific needs of restaurants. Whether you're a boutique cafe or a large-scale kitchen, our flexible ordering system ensures you get exactly what you need — fresh, fast, and reliable.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Got questions or want to place a custom order? We're here to help.

contactusdescription: Got questions or want to place a custom order? We're here to help.
aboutdescription: Soukai was founded with the vision of making fresh, local produce accessible to restaurants of all sizes. We work closely with a network of trusted farms to ensure quality, traceability, and sustainability in every delivery. Our platform enables restaurants to customize orders based on seasonality and menu requirements, creating a seamless farm-to-kitchen experience.
service1_desc: Order vegetables based on your unique menu and volume needs. No waste, just what you need.
service2_desc: We source directly from trusted farms to deliver the freshest produce every time.
service3_desc: Count on Soukai for on-time deliveries so your kitchen runs smoothly and efficiently.

about_desc: Soukai is your reliable restaurant supply partner, serving 30+ kitchens with daily essentials.
testimonialsDesc: What our clients say about us

sita.name: Sita Shrestha
sita.saying: Soukai always delivers fresh ingredients right on time. Their service has streamlined our kitchen workflow!

ramesh.name: Ramesh Khatri
ramesh.saying: Working with Soukai has been a game-changer. We no longer worry about inventory — it's always taken care of.

aarati.name: Aarati Lama
aarati.saying: Their organic juice and wine selection is top-notch. Highly reliable for custom orders too.

dipen.name: Dipen Maharjan
dipen.saying: Fresh vegetables, no delays, and excellent customer support — Soukai is our first choice.

restaurantsUsedByDesc: Trusted by restaurants that value freshness, speed, and quality.
